CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 23, 1950, pg. 7 reads: "Sixtieth Wedding Anniversary - Mr. and Mrs. Louis Ferguson of Beltzhoover will observe sixty years of wedded life Monday, Sept. 25. Like the seventy-fifth year, it is their diamond anniversary and all though they may not receive the precious stones as gifts, friends and neighbors are preparing to shower them with "love" tokens. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Mr. and Mrs. Louis Ferguson, posed in home at 233 Sylvania Avenue, Beltzhoover, for Sixtieth wedding anniversary
